item.title: Bitcoin is The Mycelium of Money
item.description: This article by Brandon Quittem was first published in his blog. Contribute. Foreward # I need to give credit to Dan Held for publishing his 4-part series comparing bitcoin’s origin to planting a tree. While I loved his series, I believe a more robust analogy is comparing bitcoin to fungi. If you’re new to this topic, strap in — it is my honor to initiate you into the fascinating world of fungi.
